steps.title: Show and hide sprites on different backdrops
steps.content:
When you are creating a book, animation, presentation, or game with levels, some sprites should only show on some backdrops.

Show and hide sprites on different backdrops: See inside
Click on the Stage or press the Space key to switch to the next backdrop.

Use show and hide blocks with the when backdrop switches to block to make sprites only show on the backdrops where they belong.

The Beachball sprite:

when backdrop switches to [Beach Rio v]
show

when backdrop switches to [Soccer 2 v]
hide

Set the backdrop when green flag clicked to make sure that sprites show or hide correctly on the first backdrop:

when flag clicked
switch backdrop to [Beach Rio v]

Tip: You can also make sprites show and hide when green flag clicked.
